welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Calexico, the charming city known for its rich culture and delicious Mexican cuisine. We invite you to explore and savor all that our vibrant city has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Centro NAF Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at El Centro NAF Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brawley Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Brawley Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
